prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of John Gorham Palfrey, Accession #8098, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited on 1965 November 26.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Palfrey requests page numbers of a quote from Leonard Bacon's Early Constitutional History of Connecticut; discusses travel and money; solicits contributions for the North American Review; and requests a paper on the Geological Survey of Massachusetts. A photograph of Palfrey is included.

did.unittitle: John Gorham Palfrey to Mr. Hoadly 1858 Nov 27

scopecontent.p: Requests page numbers of a quote from Bacon's Early Constitutional History of Connecticut.

did.unittitle: J. G. P. to T. Bigelow

scopecontent.p: Discusses travel plans and mentions sums of money.

did.unittitle: J. G. P. to Samuel L. Dana n.d.

scopecontent.p: Asks Dana to become a contributor to the North American Reviewand requests a paper on Hitchcock's Geological Survey of Massachusetts.
Signed, to the Hon. E. Lyuph Stanley
